slidelink.displaytext: Lesson 1: Serving Angry and Upset Customers
Using the acknowledge and refocus technique
Drawing the line at abusive behavior
Lesson 2: Learning from angry and upset customers
Lesson 3: Preventing customer from being upset and angry.
